summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to expenses and revenues of the City's General Fund in connection with implementing a court order; amending appropriations for the General Fund so that it can make a refund to the Water Fund; making cash transfers between City funds; and increasing the fee or tax on persons selling or furnishing water to fund such refund and amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 5.48.050 in connection therewith; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
note: Lane v. City of Seattle, et al
